popular activities: the whale shark safari, a boat trip to find and swim with the biggest fish there is. After about an hour of pleasant motoring between islands, our guide cuts the motor and shouts, Put on your snorkel gear, quick! An ecstasy of fumbling, and a minute later we're in the warm water, swimming alongside a 4m whale shark.
